text: Mɛnilu bɛɛ kusan bolo labaara kɛla kosɛbɛ baarakɛlailu tɛma, woilu ka Alla daa makɛ faaninbon jɛrɛ ladan faanin janya tan na. Faanin woilu tɛrɛ faaningbɛ ɲumailu le ri, kari buleman ni kari wulenman ɲalagbɛ ni kari wulenman kadi kadi ye mɛnilu la. Mɛn kusan faanin sɔɔla kosɛbɛ, wo ka serubɛn sawurailu ta woilu kan.
